quote: Helping people to pay less in taxes is one of the most patriotic things you can do.
why_clipworthy: This statement challenges the conventional view of tax payments and adds a patriotic twist.
suggested_hook: Why paying less in taxes might be the most patriotic thing you do.

why_clipworthy: The dramatic reduction in tax debt is a compelling example of successful negotiation.
suggested_hook: How a $249,000 tax debt was settled for just $20.
